name: directus
description: Directus is an open-source headless CMS and data management platform that wraps existing databases with a sleek UI and APIs. It supports SQL databases, custom workflows, GraphQL, and can be self-hosted or used in the cloud.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Wrap any SQL database with instant APIs. Database to API in minutes

features.title: Graphql & Rest
features.description: Flexible API options for any frontend. Universal compatibility

features.title: Custom Workflows
features.description: Automate tasks with visual workflow builder. No-code automation

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Granular permissions for teams and users. Secure data management

features.title: Sleek Interface
features.description: Modern, intuitive admin panel. Beautiful content management

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete ownership of your CMS and data. No vendor lock-in ever
